name: BROINK
description:
Controls:

  • Gamepad highly recommended!
  • Otherwise arrow keys or WASD (or both in local multiplayer)
  • R to restart or to skip to the next match if you won

Source Code:

  • You can grab the full GameMaker project here: https://github.com/LooveToLoose/BROINK
  • It's published as CreativeCommons0 so do withit whatever the hell you please. :)

Enjoy!
